pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:1.11: 40 centimeters is based on my calculation of the _sugataṅgulī_, “the standard fingerbreadth”, as 5 cm. For further explanation, see comment at _bhikkhu-saṅghādisesa_ 6.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:4.4: MS has ellipses points here, but not so the PTS version. In fact, the ellipses points do not really fit, since the monks being robbed is not what you would expect to happen next. I therefore follow the PTS punctuation.
